title: "Nordio non è più garantista", e gli avvocati scioperano contro di lui per tre giorni
description: L'annuncio giusto nel giorno in cui a Bari il Guardasigilli dice che è "figlio di avvocati ma si sente magistrato" e intitola l'aula della prima sezione penale della Corte di Appello all'avvocato Eustacchio Sisto, padre del suo vice ministro Francesco Paolo Sisto di For…
translatedTitle: "Nordio is no longer a guarantor", and the lawyers strike against him for three days
translatedDesc: The right announcement on the day when the Justice Minister in Bari says he is "the son of lawyers but feels like a magistrate" and names the courtroom of the first criminal section of the Court of Appeal after the lawyer Eustacchio Sisto, father of his deputy minister Francesco Paolo Sisto of For…

title: La resa dei conti in FI preoccupa gli alleati: oggi la nomina di Barelli a capogruppo
description: L'elezione del nuovo presidente dei deputati azzurri sarà l'occasione di un aspro confronto interno. Ronzulli smentisce la telefonata di Renzi ma il contatto c'è stato
translatedTitle: The showdown in FI worries the allies: today the appointment of Barelli as group leader
translatedDesc: The election of the new president of the blue deputies will be the occasion for a bitter internal confrontation. Ronzulli denies Renzi's phone call but there was contact

title: Carne sintetica nel mirino del governo: dopo la farina d'insetti ecco la nuova battaglia di Lollobrigida
description: Oggi in Consiglio dei ministri è stato discusso un disegno di legge che prevede il divieto di produzione e vendita di cibi e mangimi sintetici, con multe fino a 60mila euro. Una battaglia portata avanti da Coldiretti. "Noi primi al mondo con una legge del genere", dice il ministro …
translatedTitle: Synthetic meat in the government's sights: after the insect meal here is the new battle of Lollobrigida
translatedDesc: Today in the Council of Ministers a bill was discussed which provides for a ban on the production and sale of synthetic food and feed, with fines of up to 60 thousand euros. A battle carried on by Coldiretti. "We are the first in the world with such a law," says the minister …

title: Rai Sport, De Stefano lascia. La destra apre il valzer ai vertici della tv pubblica
description: La direttrice della testata sportiva si dimette per "motivi personali" dopo screzi interni ma pesano gli appetiti dell'esecutivo. Interim a Franzelli, in attesa del risiko nomine
translatedTitle: Rai Sport, De Stefano leaves. The right opens the waltz at the top of public television
translatedDesc: The director of the sports magazine resigns for "personal reasons" after internal disagreements but the appetites of the executive weigh. Interim for Franzelli, pending the risk nomination

title: Madia: "Basta con le spartizioni nel Pd, la minoranza faccia la sua parte ma stia fuori dalla segreteria"
description: Intervista all'ex ministra della Pubblica Amministrazione: "Il mito dell’unità basato su un finto unanimismo finora ha divorato tutti i leader del partito"
translatedTitle: Madia: "Enough with the partitions in the Democratic Party, the minority does its part but stays out of the secretariat"
translatedDesc: Interview with the former Minister of Public Administration: "The myth of unity based on a fake unanimity has so far devoured all the leaders of the party"

title: Rai, prove d'intesa di Meloni con Conte sulla direzione del Tg1. Il pranzo del leader M5s con Chiocci
description: L'ipotesi del contratto a termine pur di superare i veti sindacali. Il leader del M5S pronto a sostenere il giornalista di destra
translatedTitle: Rai, evidence of agreement between Meloni and Conte on the direction of Tg1. The lunch of the M5s leader with Chiocci
translatedDesc: The hypothesis of the fixed-term contract in order to overcome the trade union vetoes. The leader of the M5S ready to support the right-wing journalist

title: Pd, Schlein chiama a rapporto i gruppi dem: "Sciogliamo insieme i nodi interni"
description: Il debutto della segretaria democratica coi parlamentari. Domattina il voto sui capigruppo
translatedTitle: Pd, Schlein calls the dem groups to report: "Let's untie the internal knots together"
translatedDesc: The debut of the democratic secretary with the parliamentarians. Tomorrow morning the vote on group leaders

title: Laganà sulle nomine pubbliche: "La Rai non è terra di conquista. Piccoli Stalin nei corridoi? Io non ne ho visti, forse dovrei cercare meglio"
description: Intervista al consigliere di amministrazione della tv di Stato: "Da parte di Sangiuliano indelicato ironizzare sulle posture politiche dei suoi ex colleghi. E sull'ipotesi Chiocci al Tg1 mi preme ricordare che è un dovere valorizzare prima le risorse interne"
translatedTitle: Laganà on public appointments: "Rai is not a land of conquest. Little Stalins in the corridors? I haven't seen any, maybe I should look better"
translatedDesc: Interview with the director of state TV: "Sangiuliano is indelicate for making fun of the political postures of his former colleagues. And on the Chiocci hypothesis on Tg1, I would like to remind you that it is a duty to enhance internal resources first"

title: Diritti dei bambini e coppie gay, sindaci pronti alla rivolta: "Lasciateci tutelare questi figli". Lettera al governo e in piazza il 12 maggio
description: La polemica dopo lo stop alla registrazione all'anagrafe imposta dal Viminale: gli amministratori delle grandi città scrivono alla destra e lanciano l'invito ai parlamentari
translatedTitle: Rights of children and gay couples, mayors ready for revolt: "Let us protect these children". Letter to the government and in the streets on 12 May
translatedDesc: The controversy after the halt to registry office registration imposed by the Viminale: the administrators of the big cities write to the right and launch an invitation to parliamentarians

title: Moratti ora lavora a un listone per le europee 2024, in stand by i rapporti con il Terzo polo
description: Dopo due giorni a San Patrignano, l'ex vicepresidente della Lombardia ci riprova. Il progetto è una confederazione centrista e moderata: "popolare, riformista e liberale". I possibili compagni di viaggio vanno da Cateno De Luca a Gaetano Quagliariello, da Giuseppe De Mita a Mar…
translatedTitle: Moratti is now working on a plank for the 2024 European Championships, with relations with the third pole on standby
translatedDesc: After two days in San Patrignano, the former vice president of Lombardy tries again. The project is a centrist and moderate confederation: "popular, reformist and liberal". Possible travel companions range from Cateno De Luca to Gaetano Quagliariello, from Giuseppe De Mita to Mar…

title: Il ministro Nordio a Bari tende la mano ai magistrati: "Venero la loro autonomia". E promette: "Colmeremo i vuoti della giustizia barese"
description: Il titolare del dicastero della Giustizia in città per visitare gli uffici (che hanno una sede provvisoria in attesa della risoluzione definitiva del problema di edilizia con la Cittadella della giustizia) e intitolare un'aula della corte d'Appello a Eustacchio Sisto, padre del vicem…
translatedTitle: Minister Nordio in Bari extends his hand to the magistrates: "I venerate their autonomy". And he promises: "We will fill the gaps in the Bari justice system"
translatedDesc: The holder of the Department of Justice in the city to visit the offices (which have a temporary location pending the definitive resolution of the building problem with the Citadel of Justice) and name a room of the Court of Appeal after Eustacchio Sisto, father of the deputy …

title: La proposta di FdI: "Punire chi istiga all'anoressia". Si rischia il carcere fino a due anni. Il Pd: "Usate solo manganello e manette"
description: Il disegno di legge presentato dal senatore Balboni. La deputata dem Gribaudo: "Neanche un euro per il bonus psicologo"
translatedTitle: FdI's proposal: "Punish those who instigate anorexia". You risk imprisonment of up to two years. The Pd: "Use only truncheon and handcuffs"
translatedDesc: The bill presented by Senator Balboni. The deputy dem Gribaudo: "Not even a euro for the psychologist bonus"

title: L'aborto? "Non è un diritto", la maternità surrogata? "Pratica razzista". Il ciclone Roccella contro femministe e coppie arcobaleno
description: In cinque mesi di governo Meloni, con le sue dichiarazioni la ministra alla Famiglia è spesso finita nelle polemiche
translatedTitle: Abortion? "It's not a right", surrogacy? "Racist practice". Cyclone Roccella against feminists and rainbow couples
translatedDesc: In five months of Meloni's government, the minister to the family has often ended up in controversy with her statements

title: Il ristorante della Camera aumenta il prezzo: 2 euro in più per il menu a chilometro zero del contadino
description: Si paga 15 euro. Nei piatti i prodotti stagionali e locali (quasi tutti del Lazio) per un accordo con la Coldiretti
translatedTitle: The restaurant of the Chamber increases the price: 2 euros more for the farmer's zero kilometer menu
translatedDesc: You pay 15 euros. In the dishes, seasonal and local products (almost all from Lazio) for an agreement with Coldiretti

title: La campagna social dell'Anpi: ogni giorno la foto di un partigiano, ebreo, antifascista sui social. "Basta revisionismo"
description: L'iniziativa dell'Associazione dopo la polemica scoppiata per la frase di meloni sulle Fosse Ardeatini ("335 uccisi solo perché italiani")
translatedTitle: The social campaign of the Anpi: every day the photo of a partisan, Jew, anti-fascist on social networks. "Enough Revisionism"
translatedDesc: The initiative of the Association after the controversy that broke out over the sentence of melons on the Fosse Ardeatini ("335 killed just because they were Italians")

title: Tra una settimana si vota in Friuli Venezia Giulia: la sfida tra Fedriga e il rivale giallo-rosso Moretuzzo. Urne aperte a Udine
description: Urne aperte il 2 e 3 aprile, l'attuale governatore candidato del centrodestra prova ad ottenere il secondo mandato
translatedTitle: In a week we will vote in Friuli Venezia Giulia: the challenge between Fedriga and the yellow-red rival Moretuzzo. Ballot boxes open in Udine
translatedDesc: Polls open on 2 and 3 April, the current centre-right candidate governor is trying to obtain a second term

title: Amministrative, il fronte progressista non decolla: in 19 città al voto alleanza Pd-M5S siglata solo in cinque casi
description: Alle elezioni del 14 e 15 maggio il patto tra i dem e il Movimento non si consolida, come successo per il Lazio e Lombardia. In nove capoluoghi i due partiti vanno al voto in coalizioni diverse
translatedTitle: Administrative, the progressive front does not take off: in 19 cities to vote Pd-M5S alliance signed only in five cases
translatedDesc: In the elections of 14 and 15 May, the pact between the dem and the Movement did not consolidate, as happened for Lazio and Lombardy. In nine capitals, the two parties vote in different coalitions

title: Nomine e affari, patto Meloni-Berlusconi. E Renzi chiama la "ribelle" Ronzulli
description: Nell'accordo FI-FdI un ruolo a Paolo Scaroni in Enel o Leonardo. I coordinatori azzurri silurati tentati dall'addio
translatedTitle: Appointments and business, Meloni-Berlusconi pact. And Renzi calls the "rebel" Ronzulli
translatedDesc: In the FI-FdI agreement, a role for Paolo Scaroni in Enel or Leonardo. The torpedoed blue coordinators tempted by farewell

title: Cala la fiducia nell’Ue: mai così bassa in 3 anni. Italiani “eurodistanti” ma contrari all'Italexit
description: I giovani rimangono gli europeisti più convinti. Euroscetticismo più marcato fra gli elettori di destra e 5S
translatedTitle: Confidence in the EU is falling: never so low in 3 years. Italians "Eurodistant" but opposed to Italexit
translatedDesc: Young people remain the most convinced pro-Europeans. More marked Euroskepticism among right-wing and 5S voters

title: Maternità surrogata, la crociata di Roccella: "È una pratica razzista"
description: La ministra all'attacco delle famiglie arcobaleno: "Il bimbo ha diritto a una mamma e un papà". Gualtieri: "Avanti con le trascrizioni". La replica: "Rispetti la legge"
translatedTitle: Surrogacy, Roccella's crusade: "It's a racist practice"
translatedDesc: The minister attacks rainbow families: "The child has the right to a mum and a dad". Gualtieri: "Continue with the transcripts". Reply: "Respect the law"

title: Le donne del Cavaliere, quel potere al femminile nel regno di Arcore
description: La storia di Forza Italia è costellata da cerchi magici a trazione femminile che mutano ciclicamente
translatedTitle: The women of the Knight, that female power in the kingdom of Arcore
translatedDesc: The history of Forza Italia is dotted with female-driven magic circles that change cyclically

title: Pd, la tela di Schlein con l’ala Bonaccini. Ipotesi vice segretario
description: La leader potrebbe dare alla minoranza un posto di rilievo in segreteria per placare la fronda. Oggi riunisce i gruppi
translatedTitle: Pd, Schlein's canvas with the Bonaccini wing. Hypothesis deputy secretary
translatedDesc: The leader could give the minority a prominent post in the secretariat to appease the frond. Today it brings together the groups

title: Gli insulti della destra e il rischio di isolare i "figli del reato"
description: Come se i veri nemici della saldezza morale del nostro paese fossero un drappello di bambini e ragazzi nati con gestazione di supporto da coppie etero o omosessuali
translatedTitle: The insults of the right and the risk of isolating the "children of the crime"
translatedDesc: As if the real enemies of our country's moral stability were a group of children born with supportive gestation from heterosexual or homosexual couples

title: Sangiuliano: "In Rai ancora qualche piccolo Stalin col colbacco"
description: Per il ministro della Cultura il canone va pagato ma Viale Mazzini deve essere "davvero plurale"
translatedTitle: Sangiuliano: "In Rai there are still some little Stalins with fur hats"
translatedDesc: According to the Minister of Culture, the fee must be paid but Viale Mazzini must be "really plural"

title: Fosse Ardeatine, La Malfa: "Meloni come Almirante. Dietro l’italianità nasconde la storia"
description: Intervista all'ex segretario del Partito repubblicano: "La premier usa gli stessi trucchi retorici del segretario del Msi. È ancora un passo indietro rispetto a Fini"
translatedTitle: Fosse Ardeatine, La Malfa: "Meloni like Almirante. History hides behind the Italian spirit"
translatedDesc: Interview with the former secretary of the Republican Party: "The prime minister uses the same rhetorical tricks as the secretary of the MSI. She is still a step behind Fini"

title: Rutelli: "Più lavori green per uscire dalla crisi climatica o rischiamo la rivolta sociale"
description: Intervista all'ex leader della Margherita: "I temi ambientali sono tutta la mia vita. Senza un programma che impieghi milioni di italiani perdiamo il consenso delle persone su questi temi"
translatedTitle: Rutelli: "More green jobs to get out of the climate crisis or we risk social revolt"
translatedDesc: Interview with the former Margherita leader: "Environmental issues are my whole life. Without a program that employs millions of Italians, we lose people's consensus on these issues"

title: Maternità surrogata, nuovo affondo di Roccella: "Ha connotazioni razziste". Poi attacca Gualtieri: "Su trascrizioni si assume responsabilità"
description: La ministra della Famiglia a Zona Bianca: "Omosessuali ottimi genitori. Priorità sono i diritti dei bambini". Il sindaco di Roma a Santi Apostoli annuncia iniziative con altri primi cittadini
translatedTitle: Surrogate motherhood, new lunge from Roccella: "It has racist connotations". Then he attacks Gualtieri: "He assumes responsibility for transcripts"
translatedDesc: The Minister of the White Zone Family: "Homosexuals are excellent parents. Children's rights are the priority". The mayor of Rome in Santi Apostoli announces initiatives with other first citizens

title: Pd, Schlein domani riunisce i gruppi e martedì ripropone Braga e Boccia come capigruppo
description: Nell'incontro di ieri, il presidente Stefano Bonaccini aveva detto ai suoi di attendere una proposta dalla segretaria in vista del voto dei capigruppo previsto per martedì
translatedTitle: Pd, Schlein brings the groups together tomorrow and on Tuesday proposes Braga and Boccia as group leaders again
translatedDesc: In yesterday's meeting, the president Stefano Bonaccini had told his followers to wait for a proposal from the secretary in view of the vote of the group leaders scheduled for Tuesday

title: Autonomia, Calderoli: "Ecco il comitato per i Lep, presiede Cassese". L'opposizione: "Parlamento esautorato"
description: Tra i nomi del gruppo di persone per l'individuazione dei livelli essenziali delle prestazioni, ci sono anche Giuliano Amato e Visco. Zaratti (Avs) attacca: "Il progetto 'Spacca Italia' è devastante"
translatedTitle: Autonomy, Calderoli: "Here is the committee for the Lep, chaired by Cassese". The opposition: "Parliament ousted"
translatedDesc: Among the names of the group of people for the identification of the essential levels of performance, there are also Giuliano Amato and Visco. Zaratti (Avs) attacks: "The 'Spacca Italia' project is devastating"

title: Dal 'Bunga Bunga' a 'Meno male che Silvio c'è': la vita di Berlusconi diventa un musical. Il debutto a Londra
description: In questi giorni in scena al teatro Southwark Playhouse Elephant. Il racconto satirico sulle vicende giudiziarie e personali dell'ex presidente del Consiglio. A ripercorrerle tre donne: la magistrata Ilda Boccasini, l'ex moglie Veronica Lario e una giornalista
translatedTitle: From 'Bunga Bunga' to 'Thank goodness Silvio is here': Berlusconi's life becomes a musical. London debut
translatedDesc: These days on stage at the Southwark Playhouse Elephant theatre. The satirical story on the judicial and personal affairs of the former prime minister. To retrace them three women: the magistrate Ilda Boccasini, his ex-wife Veronica Lario and a journalist

title: Elezioni, blitz del centrodestra per cambiare le regole del conteggio delle schede: rischio pioggia di ricorsi
description: Per gli esponenti di FdI, Forza Italia e Lega che siedono in Giunta delle elezioni se un elettore ha messo più croci e non solo una a favore di una coalizione, quel voto non va annullato e magicamente si trasforma in buono premiando il favor voti
translatedTitle: Elections, center-right blitz to change ballot counting rules: risk of rain of appeals
translatedDesc: For the exponents of FdI, Forza Italia and Lega who sit on the Election Board if a voter has put more crosses and not just one in favor of a coalition, that vote should not be canceled and magically turns into a good one by rewarding the favor vote

title: Angiola Filipponio racconta la sua vita: "Scelsi mio marito Pinuccio quando non era ancora Tatarella"
description: L'intervista all'ex docente dell'Università di Bari e ex deputata di Alleanza nazionale. "Non voglio parlare di Forza Nuova perché loro sono il nulla. Berlusconi un gentiluomo con me e Violante un grande amico"
translatedTitle: Angiola Filipponio talks about her life: "I chose my husband Pinuccio when he wasn't Tatarella yet"
translatedDesc: The interview with the former professor of the University of Bari and former deputy of the National Alliance. "I don't want to talk about Forza Nuova because they are nothing. Berlusconi is a gentleman with me and Violante is a great friend"

title: Rocca alza le tasse nel Lazio, l'Irpef a livelli record e pagheranno i poveri: "Grazie Zingaretti"
description: Pronta la bozza: "Sarà approvata a entro fine marzo". Un altro salasso fiscale di oltre un punto e mezzo: l'imposta regionale su dipendenti e pensionati passa così dall'1,73 per cento al 3,33
translatedTitle: Rocca raises taxes in Lazio, Irpef at record levels and the poor will pay: "Thanks Zingaretti"
translatedDesc: The draft is ready: "It will be approved by the end of March". Another tax drain of more than one and a half points: the regional tax on employees and pensioners thus goes from 1.73 percent to 3.33

title: Ribaltone Forza Italia, Berlusconi all’angolo e gli esclusi in fuga
description: La svolta pro Meloni si è consumata in 48 ore con la regia di Marta Fascina. L'ala Ronzulli ora medita la scissione
translatedTitle: Turnaround Forza Italia, Berlusconi on the corner and the excluded on the run
translatedDesc: The pro Meloni turning point took place in 48 hours under the direction of Marta Fascina. The Ronzulli wing is now contemplating the split

title: Schlein e l'ipotesi di un governo ombra: tecnici e facce nuove nella segreteria Pd
description: La numero uno dem pensa alla squadra con cui dirigere il partito alle Europee e poi alle Politiche. A figure esterne deleghe come ambiente e casa
translatedTitle: Schlein and the hypothesis of a shadow government: technicians and new faces in the Pd secretariat
translatedDesc: The number one dem is thinking about the team with which to lead the party at the European championships and then at the Politics. To external figures delegated as environment and home

title: Deborah Lipstadt: "Stereotipi antisemiti duri a morire. Bisogna combattere ancora il negazionismo"
description: L'inviata speciale dell'amministrazione Usa: "Disinformazione e pregiudizi viaggiano più veloci grazie ai social"
translatedTitle: Deborah Lipstadt: "Anti-Semitic stereotypes die hard. We still need to fight denial"
translatedDesc: The special envoy of the US administration: "Disinformation and prejudices travel faster thanks to social media"

title: Ambrosi (FdI): "Noi amiamo il buon cibo e vino, la sinistra gli insetti e le droghe. Ecco perché sono una tipa di destra"
description: Il tweet della deputata di Fratelli d'Italia. Utenti scatenati tra cui Elio Vito, ex parlamentare di Forza Italia: "E soprattutto senza stereotipi e luoghi comuni!". E altri: "Ti sei dimenticata che mangiano i bambini"
translatedTitle: Ambrosi (FdI): "We love good food and wine, the left, insects and drugs. That's why I'm a right-wing girl"
translatedDesc: The tweet of the member of the Brothers of Italy. Unleashed users including Elio Vito, former Forza Italia parliamentarian: "And above all without stereotypes and clichés!". And others: "Did you forget that children eat"

title: Consiglio europeo, l'affondo di Schlein: "Meloni isolata in Ue, FdI voleva uscire dall'euro"
description: La segretaria del Pd: per il governo bilancio misero, Italia costretta dietro i muri che i nazionalisti alleati di Meloni vogliono costruire
translatedTitle: European Council, Schlein's lunge: "Meloni isolated in the EU, FdI wanted to leave the euro"
translatedDesc: The secretary of the Democratic Party: for the government a poor budget, Italy forced behind the walls that the nationalist allies of Meloni want to build

title: FdI ritira emendamento sulle toghe nei ministeri. Anm: "Stop al tentativo di approfittare di una legge che già ci discrimina"
description: Il partito di Meloni fa marcia indietro. Ma la Lega ne presenta un altro per prorogare oltre i 10 anni il fuori ruolo con la scusa del Pnrr. Costa di Azione chiede a Nordio se è al corrente. Bongiorno: "Modifiche non autorizzate, fuori dalla nostra linea"
translatedTitle: FdI withdraws amendment on robes in ministries. Anm: "Stop trying to take advantage of a law that already discriminates against us"
translatedDesc: Meloni's party backtracks. But the League presents another to extend beyond 10 years the out of tenure with the excuse of the Pnrr. Action Coast asks Nordio if he knows. Bongiorno: "Unauthorized modifications, outside our line"

title: Scontro tra Striscia la notizia e Monica Maggioni su un presunto conflitto di interessi. La giornalista: "Vi querelo, fatti già archiviati"
description: Il servizio del tg satirico Mediaset indaga su quattro società di produzione video riconducibili alla direttrice del Tg1 che hanno collaborato con la tv di Stato fornendo documentari andati in onda proprio negli spazi di cui lei era responsabile. La replica: "Improprie accuse"
translatedTitle: Clash between Striscia la Notizia and Monica Maggioni over an alleged conflict of interest. The journalist: "I'm suing you, facts already archived"
translatedDesc: The service of the satirical news Mediaset investigates four video production companies attributable to the director of Tg1 who collaborated with the state TV providing documentaries that aired precisely in the spaces for which she was responsible. The reply: "Improper accusations"

title: Meloni e Piantedosi condannati per le occupazioni abusive di Roma: "Paghino 6,3 milioni"
description: Sentenza del tribunale civile sul Maam, il Museo dell'altro e dell'altrove mai sgomberato dalla prefettura. I giudici: "Presidenza del Consiglio e Viminale dovevano intervenire". Gualtieri vuole comprare il palazzo
translatedTitle: Meloni and Piantedosi convicted of illegal occupation of Rome: "They pay 6.3 million"
translatedDesc: Ruling of the civil court on the Maam, the Museum of the Other and Elsewhere never cleared from the prefecture. The judges: "Presidency of the Council and Interior Ministry had to intervene". Gualtieri wants to buy the building

title: Alessandro Sorte, chi è il nuovo coordinatore regionale di Forza Italia scelto da Berlusconi per far tornare pace nel partito
description: L'esponente politico sostituirà Licia Ronzulli. La moglie Matilde Tura è capogruppo del Pd con delega alla sanità e alle recenti primarie ha sostenuto Elly Schlein
translatedTitle: Alessandro Sorte, who is the new regional coordinator of Forza Italia chosen by Berlusconi to restore peace to the party
translatedDesc: The politician will replace Licia Ronzulli. His wife Matilde Tura is the leader of the Democratic Party with responsibility for health care and Elly Schlein supported her in the recent primaries

title: Bonaccini: "L'unità si conquista in due". Ma nel Pd nessuno vuole lo scontro
description: Il governatore in videocall con i suoi cerca di evitare strappi con la segretaria. I neoulivisti si smarcano sui capigruppo
translatedTitle: Bonaccini: "Unity is won in two". But in the Democratic Party, no one wants a confrontation
translatedDesc: The governor on video call with his family tries to avoid disagreements with the secretary. The neo-ulivists distance themselves from the group leaders

title: Armi all'Ucraina, Conte: "Rischio che deflagri conflitto mondiale. Cina può esercitare ruolo importante"
description: Il leader del Movimento 5 Stelle a Matera: "Passi avanti sul fronte dell'immigrazione ancora non li abbiamo constatati"
translatedTitle: Arms to Ukraine, Conte: "Risk of a world conflict erupting. China can play an important role"
translatedDesc: The leader of the 5 Star Movement in Matera: "We haven't seen any progress on the immigration front yet"

title: Salvini attacca Sala sullo stop alle auto inquinanti: "Un po' di green va bene, ma non ideologico come il suo"
description: Il ministro e segretario leghista: "Questo è classismo: se sei ricco ti puoi permettere Milano, se non sei ricco stattene gentilmente a casa tua"
translatedTitle: Salvini attacks Sala on the stop to polluting cars: "A little green is fine, but not as ideological as his"
translatedDesc: The Northern League minister and secretary: "This is classism: if you're rich you can afford Milan, if you're not rich, kindly stay at home"

title: Chi va e chi no in Parlamento: Berlusconi, Fascina e Calenda i più assenteisti. Conte e Schlein sopra il 50%
description: Lo studio Openpolis: a sei mesi dall'inizio della legislatura il tasso di partecipazione ai lavori si aggira attorno al 75 per cento. In generale opposizioni più presenti nelle Camere. Bonelli e Fratoianni i più assidui
translatedTitle: Who goes and who doesn't in Parliament: Berlusconi, Fascina and Calenda the most absentees. Conte and Schlein above 50%
translatedDesc: The Openpolis study: six months into the legislature, the participation rate in the works is around 75 percent. In general, more oppositions are present in the Chambers. Bonelli and Fratoianni the most assiduous

title: Con il Pnrr ritornano le porte girevoli magistratura-politica: il rischio che si aggiri la legge Cartabia
description: Due emendamenti di Lega e FdI bloccati per ora al Senato. E Costa di Azione chiede al Guardasigilli Nordio: "Ma lei lo sapeva?"
translatedTitle: With the Pnrr the judiciary-political revolving doors return: the risk that the Cartabia law will be circumvented
translatedDesc: Two amendments by Lega and FdI blocked for now in the Senate. And Costa di Azione asks the Keeper of the Seals Nordio: "But did you know about it?"

title: La partigiana Iole Mancini: “Meloni finge di ignorare la storia. La premier non è all’altezza”
description: Intervista alla staffetta di via Rasella, 103 anni, che venne rinchiusa a via Tasso: "Vorrei far tornare i nostalgici per un mesetto nel Ventennio"
translatedTitle: The partisan Iole Mancini: “Meloni pretends to ignore the story. The premier is not up to par”
translatedDesc: Interview with the relay team of via Rasella, 103 years old, who was locked up in via Tasso: "I would like to bring back the nostalgics for a month or two in the twenty years"

title: "Uccisi perché italiani". Il revisionismo di Meloni sulle Fosse Ardeatine
description: Nell'anniversario dell'eccidio del 1944 in cui morirono anche 9 stranieri, né la premier né la destra definiscono "antifasciste" le vittime. I familiari: "I fascisti stilarono una lista di oppositori del regime"
translatedTitle: "Killed because Italians". Meloni's revisionism on the Fosse Ardeatine
translatedDesc: On the anniversary of the 1944 massacre in which 9 foreigners also died, neither the prime minister nor the right define the victims as "anti-fascist". Family members: "The fascists drew up a list of opponents of the regime"

title: Bonaccini perde pezzi: la minoranza Pd si sfila dal fronte anti Schlein
description: Da Madia ad Ascani in tanti non parteciperanno oggi all'incontro con il governatore. Rischio conta al Senato
translatedTitle: Bonaccini loses pieces: the Pd minority withdraws from the anti-Schlein front
translatedDesc: From Madia to Ascani many will not participate in the meeting with the governor today. Risk matters in the Senate

title: L’orrore nazifascista dietro l’eccidio dei 335 secretato nelle Fosse Ardeatine
description: La strage del 24 marzo 1944 fu la risposta degli occupanti tedeschi all’azione partigiana. Non solo italiani tra le vittime. La comunicazione ufficiale a strage avvenuta
translatedTitle: The Nazi-fascist horror behind the massacre of the 335 secreted in the Fosse Ardeatine
translatedDesc: The massacre of 24 March 1944 was the response of the German occupiers to the partisan action. Not only Italians among the victims. The official communication after the massacre

title: Terremoto in Forza Italia, Alessandro Sorte è il nuovo coordinatore regionale della Lombardia: sostituisce Licia Ronzulli
description: Lo ha deciso Silvio Berlusconi che ha comunicato le sue scelte insieme ad altre nomine di coordinatori regionali in altre regioni
translatedTitle: Earthquake in Forza Italia, Alessandro Sorte is the new regional coordinator of Lombardy: he replaces Licia Ronzulli
translatedDesc: This was decided by Silvio Berlusconi who communicated his choices together with other appointments of regional coordinators in other regions

title: Berlusconi e le nuove regine di FI, il patto familiare sancisce la svolta
description: Il Cavaliere interviene dopo 40 giorni di silenzio e sostituisce il capogruppo alla Camera Alessandro Cattaneo con Paolo Barelli. Confermata invece al Senato Licia Ronzulli, che perde però la guida del partito in Lombardia  Marta Fascina e la figlia Marina dietro la fronda pro Meloni
translatedTitle: Berlusconi and the new queens of FI, the family pact marks the turning point
translatedDesc: The Knight intervenes after 40 days of silence and replaces the group leader in the Chamber Alessandro Cattaneo with Paolo Barelli. Instead, Licia Ronzulli was confirmed in the Senate, but she lost the leadership of the party in Lombardy Marta Fascina and her daughter Marina behind the pro Meloni frond

title: Carceri, Cirielli: "Se una madre è detenuta, le si tolga la patria potestà"
description: La proposta choc del viceministro degli Esteri
translatedTitle: Carceri, Cirielli: "If a mother is in prison, her parental authority should be taken away"
translatedDesc: The shocking proposal of the Deputy Foreign Minister

title: Fratelli d’Italia vuole cancellare il reato di tortura. Ilaria Cucchi si appella al capo dello Stato
description: È arrivata in commissione Giustizia la proposta di un gruppo di deputati meloniani per eliminare gli articoli del codice penale approvati nel 2017 dopo un lungo dibattito. All'epoca la premier aveva dichiarato che ostacolavano le polizie
translatedTitle: Brothers of Italy wants to cancel the crime of torture. Ilaria Cucchi appeals to the head of state
translatedDesc: The proposal from a group of Melonian deputies to eliminate the articles of the penal code approved in 2017 after a long debate has arrived in the Justice Committee. At the time, the premier had declared that they were hindering the police

title: Hanno tutti ragione | "Scemi di guerra"a Sabaudia, dialogo senza censura tra Giletti e Travaglio
description:
Questo è il numero di venerdì 24 marzo 2023 della newsletter Hanno tutti ragione, firmata da Stefano Cappellini. Per attivare l'iscrizione clicca qui

Il confronto in prima serata tra il conduttore tv e il direttore de Il Fatto quotidiano, autore di un libro sul conflitto in Ucrai…
translatedTitle: They are all right | "Scemi di Guerra" in Sabaudia, uncensored dialogue between Giletti and Travaglio
translatedDesc:
This is the Friday 24 March 2023 issue of the newsletter They're all right, signed by Stefano Cappellini. To activate the subscription click here

The prime time confrontation between the TV host and the director of Il Fatto newspaper, author of a book on the conflict in Ukraine…

title: A Bruxelles Meloni accerchiata sulla ratifica del Mes. Ma lei frena ancora: "Meglio altri strumenti"
description: La premier parla ai giornalisti al termine del vertice Ue. Il meccanismo? "La materia non va discussa a monte, ma a valle e nel contesto in cui opera". E sull'incontro con Macron: "C'è voglia di collaborare"
translatedTitle: In Brussels Meloni surrounded on the ratification of the Mes. But she holds back again: "Other tools are better"
translatedDesc: The premier speaks to journalists at the end of the EU summit. The mechanism? "The matter should not be discussed upstream, but downstream and in the context in which it operates". And on the meeting with Macron: "There is a desire to collaborate"

title: Sondaggi politici, confermati i 10 punti tra Pd e FdI, ora sotto il 30%. Calano Lega, FI e la coalizione del centrodestra
description: La rilevazione Agi-Supermedia/Youtrend: i dem di Schlein guadagnano lo 0,9 per cento e raggiungono il 19,7. FdI resta al primo posto con il 29,7 (+0,7) mentre il Carroccio perde lo 0,7 (8,5) e il partito di Berlusconi si ferma al 6,6 (-0,4)
translatedTitle: Political polls, confirmed the 10 points between Pd and FdI, now below 30%. Calano Lega, FI and the centre-right coalition
translatedDesc: The Agi-Supermedia / Youtrend survey: Schlein's dems gain 0.9 percent and reach 19.7. FdI remains in first place with 29.7 (+0.7) while the Northern League loses 0.7 (8.5) and Berlusconi's party stops at 6.6 (-0.4)

title: La preoccupazione della Cei per l'astensionismo alle elezioni: "Segno di un malessere, serve una formazione politica"
description: I vescovi tornano sulla scarsa partecipazione democratica, sulla necessità di rivitalizzare l'impegno dei cattolici per il bene comune. Dai migranti al lavoro, dall'ambiente al pacifismo, l'esempio di Francesco e la spinta di Zuppi
translatedTitle: The CEI's concern for abstention in the elections: "A sign of a malaise, political training is needed"
translatedDesc: The bishops return to the lack of democratic participation, to the need to revitalize the commitment of Catholics for the common good. From migrants to work, from the environment to pacifism, the example of Francesco and the push of Zuppi

title: Calenda: "Sul nucleare più vicino alla destra che al Pd di Schlein"
description: Il leader del Terzo polo in tv: "Io se condivido un loro provvedimento, lo voto. Lo stesso con la sinistra". E sulla maternità surrogata attacca il Pd: "Questa ipocrisia facilita il lavoro del governo nella confusione tra Gpa e tutela dei bambini". L'esecutivo: "…
translatedTitle: Calenda: "On nuclear power closer to the right than to Schlein's Democratic Party"
translatedDesc: The leader of the Third Pole on TV: "If I agree with their provision, I vote for it. The same with the left". And on surrogacy the Democratic Party attacks: "This hypocrisy facilitates the work of the government in the confusion between Gpa and the protection of children". Executive: "…

title: Fosse Ardeatine, Meloni: "335 innocenti massacrati solo perché italiani". È polemica. Le opposizioni: "Uccisi perché antifascisti"
description: Il 79esimo anniversario dell'eccidio. Mattarella nel sacrario per un momento privato di raccoglimento. La premier in una nota: "Ferita profonda e dolorosa. La memoria è un dovere civico". Dureghello: "Data indelebile nella nostra storia"
translatedTitle: Fosse Ardeatine, Meloni: "335 innocent people massacred just because they are Italians". It's controversy. The oppositions: "Killed because they were anti-fascists"
translatedDesc: The 79th anniversary of the massacre. Mattarella in the shrine for a private moment of recollection. The premier in a note: "Deep and painful wound. Memory is a civic duty". Dureghello: "An indelible date in our history"

title: Maternità surrogata altruistica, la confroffensiva dell'associazione Coscioni. L'apertura del M5S: "Valutiamo la proposta"
description: L'associazione: la "gravidanza solidale" va resa possibile in Italia. Ma con accorgimenti chiari. Majorino lascia spiragli. Il modello solidaristico piace anche alla dem Cirinnà
translatedTitle: Altruistic surrogate motherhood, the Coscioni association's counter-offensive. The opening of the M5S: "We evaluate the proposal"
translatedDesc: The association: "supportive pregnancy" must be made possible in Italy. But with clear precautions. Majorino leaves glimmers. The solidarity model also pleases dem Cirinnà

title: Forza Italia, resa dei conti fra governisti e minoranza interna: voci di sostituzione dei capigruppo
description: Sale la tensione nel partito. A rischio Ronzulli al Senato e Cattaneo. I possibili sostituti: Paroli a Palazzo Madama e Barelli (vicino a Tajani) o Bergamini alla Camera
translatedTitle: Forza Italia, showdown between governors and internal minority: rumors of replacement of group leaders
translatedDesc: Tension rises in the party. At risk Ronzulli in the Senate and Cattaneo. Possible substitutes: Paroli in Palazzo Madama and Barelli (close to Tajani) or Bergamini in the Chamber

title: Lite tra Scholz e Macron sul nucleare. Roma fuori gioco sul dossier auto
description: La Germania ha centrato l'obiettivo ottenendo un impegno chiaro sugli e-fuel. L'Europa, invece, non vuole ascoltare le richieste di Roma sui biocarburanti che ora potrebbe finire nell'angolo
translatedTitle: Quarrel between Scholz and Macron on nuclear power. Rome out of the picture on the car dossier
translatedDesc: Germany nailed it by getting a clear commitment on e-fuels. Europe, on the other hand, does not want to listen to Rome's requests on biofuels which could now end up in the corner

title: Meloni-Macron, un'ora e 40 minuti per il vertice del disgelo. Prove di intesa su migranti ed energia
description: Tra i temi affrontati, è stato comunicato, anche il Patto di stabilità, la politica industriale, l'Ucraina
translatedTitle: Meloni-Macron, one hour and 40 minutes for the thaw summit. Tests of understanding on migrants and energy
translatedDesc: Among the topics addressed, the Stability Pact, industrial policy and Ukraine were also communicated

title: Registi, preti, ex deputati. Ecco gli 80 consulenti d’oro di Palazzo Chigi
description: Chi sono i consulenti e i consiglieri chiamati dal centrodestra negli uffici di Meloni, Tajani e Salvini. Pupi Avati e l’ex calciatore Incocciati insieme a storici collaboratori e politici rimasti senza poltrona
translatedTitle: Directors, priests, former deputies. Here are the 80 golden consultants of Palazzo Chigi
translatedDesc: Who are the consultants and advisers called by the center-right to the offices of Meloni, Tajani and Salvini. Pupi Avati and the former footballer Incocciati together with historical collaborators and politicians left without an armchair

title: Governo, ritardi nella road map. A rischio due rate del Pnrr
description: Incontro tra Gentiloni e Fitto: non tutte le carte sono a posto. Fermi i fondi del 2022, in affanno sul 2023
translatedTitle: Government, delays in the road map. At risk two installments of the Pnrr
translatedDesc: Meeting between Gentiloni and Fitto: not all cards are in place. Stop the 2022 funds, in trouble for 2023

title: Nel vuoto l'allarme di Meloni. "Rischiamo 900 mila arrivi"
description: Il monito della premier italiana ai colleghi durante il Consiglio europeo. L’ammissione sugli sbarchi triplicati. Sull’Ucraina i 27 leader riaffermeranno la condanna dell’aggressione russa
translatedTitle: Meloni's alarm in the void. "We risk 900,000 arrivals"
translatedDesc: The warning of the Italian premier to colleagues during the European Council. The admission on landings tripled. On Ukraine, the 27 leaders will reaffirm their condemnation of Russian aggression

title: Réforme des retraites : Emmanuel Macron joue l’ironie, au risque d’alimenter la colère
description: « Les œufs et les casseroles, c’est pour faire la cuisine chez moi », a déclaré le chef de l’Etat, jeudi, lors d’un déplacement dans l’Hérault, après avoir déjà tourné en dérision, la veille, l’action de manifestants qui l’attendaient en tapant sur des plats en métal.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: Emmanuel Macron plays irony, at the risk of fueling anger
translatedDesc: "Eggs and casseroles are for cooking at home," said the head of state on Thursday during a trip to Hérault, after having already made fun of the day before. action of demonstrators who were waiting for him by banging on metal dishes.

title: Retraites : nouvelles manifestations et actions coup de poing en France, en attendant la mobilisation du 1er-Mai
description: La contestation de la réforme des retraites s’est poursuivie jeudi dans plusieurs villes de France, sous forme de « tour de chauffe » avant le 1er-Mai.
translatedTitle: Pensions: new demonstrations and punch actions in France, pending the mobilization of May 1
translatedDesc: The challenge to the pension reform continued Thursday in several cities in France, in the form of a "heating tour" before May 1.

title: Maintien de l’ordre : « Le drame de Sainte-Soline était à la fois résistible et prévisible »
description: Le lourd bilan des manifestations contre les mégabassines est le résultat de choix politiques privilégiant la confrontation à la désescalade, estiment l’historien militaire Cédric Mas et le politologue Sebastian Roché dans une tribune au « Monde ».
translatedTitle: Policing: "The Sainte-Soline drama was both resistible and predictable"
translatedDesc: The heavy toll of the protests against the mega-basins is the result of political choices favoring confrontation over de-escalation, say military historian Cédric Mas and political scientist Sebastian Roché in a column in Le Monde.

title: Entre Emmanuel Macron et les intellectuels de gauche, l’histoire d’une désillusion
description: Sociologues, économistes, historiens… La gestion autoritaire de la réforme des retraites a fini de désenchanter une partie de penseurs de gauche séduits par le chef de l’Etat durant son premier quinquennat.
translatedTitle: Between Emmanuel Macron and left-wing intellectuals, the story of disillusionment
translatedDesc: Sociologists, economists, historians… The authoritarian management of the pension reform has finished disenchanting some left-wing thinkers seduced by the head of state during his first five-year term.

title: Le député Pierre Morel-A-L’Huissier visé par une enquête pour des soupçons de détournement de fonds publics
description: Le député centriste de Lozère a été visé par des perquisitions jeudi, dans le cadre d’une enquête ouverte par le Parquet national financier (PNF) en novembre 2022, après une plainte déposée par Anticor.
translatedTitle: MP Pierre Morel-A-L'Huissier under investigation for suspicion of embezzlement of public funds
translatedDesc: The centrist deputy of Lozère was targeted by searches on Thursday, as part of an investigation opened by the National Financial Prosecutor's Office (PNF) in November 2022, after a complaint filed by Anticor.

title: Derrière le naufrage de la campagne de Pécresse, une guerre de tranchées dans l’équipe de la candidate Les Républicains
description: La candidate avait choisi Jean-Baptiste Doat, un proche de Bruno Retailleau, pour diriger sa communication numérique. Mais la greffe n’a pas pris avec les équipes issues de la primaire de la droite.
translatedTitle: Behind the sinking of the Pécresse campaign, a trench warfare in the team of the candidate Les Républicains
translatedDesc: The candidate had chosen Jean-Baptiste Doat, a close friend of Bruno Retailleau, to direct her digital communication. But the transplant did not take with the teams from the right-wing primary.

title: Emmanuel Macron dans l’Hérault : relisez notre direct consacré à sa visite consacrée à l’éducation
description: Après s’être rendu au collège Louise-Michel de Ganges, où il a annoncé une augmentation mensuelle comprise « entre 100 et 230 euros net » pour tous les enseignants, le chef de l’Etat a fait une étape à Pérols.
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron in the Hérault: reread our live dedicated to his visit dedicated to education
translatedDesc: After going to the Louise-Michel College in Ganges, where he announced a monthly increase of "between 100 and 230 euros net" for all teachers, the Head of State made a stopover in Pérols.

title: Réforme des retraites : la difficile évaluation de l’impact économique de la mobilisation
description: Rares sont les entreprises qui communiquent sur les conséquences et le coût des trois mois de mobilisation.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: the difficult assessment of the economic impact of mobilization
translatedDesc: Few companies communicate on the consequences and the cost of the three months of mobilization.

title: Baisse de la dette : Bercy table sur des dépenses moindres et une croissance plus dynamique
description: Dans son programme de stabilité envoyé à Bruxelles, le gouvernement veut freiner la hausse de la dépense publique d’ici à la fin du quinquennat, mais sans préciser les économies nécessaires.
translatedTitle: Lower debt: Bercy expects lower spending and more dynamic growth
translatedDesc: In its stability program sent to Brussels, the government wants to curb the increase in public spending by the end of the five-year term, but without specifying the necessary savings.

title: Dans l’Hérault, Emmanuel Macron a parlé éducation avec les enseignants et évité les manifestants
description: A Ganges, Emmanuel Macron a annoncé une « hausse inconditionnelle » du salaire mensuel de 100 à 230 euros net pour les enseignants, « à tous les niveaux de carrière » et « dès la rentrée ». Un comité d’accueil hostile l’attendait sur place.
translatedTitle: In Hérault, Emmanuel Macron spoke about education with teachers and avoided protesters
translatedDesc: In Ganges, Emmanuel Macron announced an "unconditional increase" in the monthly salary of 100 to 230 euros net for teachers, "at all career levels" and "from the start of the school year". A hostile welcoming committee was waiting for him there.

title: Ligue des droits de l’homme : « La répression des associations constitue l’ultime facette d’un mépris postdémocratique assumé »
description: Rappelant que les associations sont souvent vues comme des « écoles de citoyenneté », les sociologues Antonio Delfini et Julien Talpin dénoncent, dans une tribune au « Monde », les pratiques institutionnelles qui les prennent pour cible.
translatedTitle: Human Rights League: "The repression of associations constitutes the ultimate facet of an assumed post-democratic contempt"
translatedDesc: Recalling that associations are often seen as "schools of citizenship", sociologists Antonio Delfini and Julien Talpin denounce, in a forum in "Le Monde", the institutional practices that target them.

title: « La France et l’Union européenne risquent de davantage subir la reconfiguration géopolitique globale que de l’orienter »
description: Avec la loi de programmation militaire, Emmanuel Macron affirme sa volonté de réarmer le pays. Mais le directeur de l’Institut français des relations internationales explique dans une tribune au « Monde » que le retard pris par les Européens est trop important par rapport aux autres puissances.
translatedTitle: “France and the European Union are more likely to suffer from the global geopolitical reconfiguration than to steer it”
translatedDesc: With the military programming law, Emmanuel Macron affirms his desire to rearm the country. But the director of the French Institute of International Relations explains in a column in the "World" that the delay taken by the Europeans is too great compared to the other powers.

title: Vincent Bolloré, la vraie fausse retraite
description: En théorie, le milliardaire breton a laissé la gestion de son groupe à ses deux fils. En pratique, il continue de tout décider, notamment ce qui concerne les médias. A 71 ans, ce très pieux capitaine d’industrie se sent investi d’une mission : utiliser son pouvoir pour défendre l’« Occident chrétien ».
translatedTitle: Vincent Bolloré, the real fake retirement
translatedDesc: In theory, the Breton billionaire left the management of his group to his two sons. In practice, he continues to decide everything, especially with regard to the media. At 71, this very pious captain of industry feels invested with a mission: to use his power to defend the "Christian West".

title: Aux Etats-Unis, le démocrate Robert Kennedy Jr annonce sa candidature à la présidentielle de 2024
description: Le fils de l’ex-ministre Robert Kennedy et neveu du président John Fitzgerald Kennedy, tous deux assassinés dans les années 1960, est un personnage controversé qui propage notamment des théories complotistes sur les vaccins.
translatedTitle: In the United States, Democrat Robert Kennedy Jr announces his candidacy for the presidency of 2024
translatedDesc: The son of ex-Minister Robert Kennedy and nephew of President John Fitzgerald Kennedy, both assassinated in the 1960s, is a controversial figure who notably propagates conspiracy theories on vaccines.

title: Hubert Falco démis de ses fonctions de maire de Toulon par arrêté préfectoral
description: Le conseil municipal de la cité varoise et le conseil de la métropole ont quinze jours pour se réunir afin de procéder à l’élection d’un nouveau maire et de ses adjoints.
translatedTitle: Hubert Falco dismissed as mayor of Toulon by prefectural decree
translatedDesc: The municipal council of the Var city and the council of the metropolis have fifteen days to meet in order to elect a new mayor and his deputies.

title: Le concert de casseroles, un outil de contestation tapageur et historique
description: De la monarchie de Juillet à la contestation de la réforme des retraites en passant par les démonstrations de l’OAS, l’ustensile de cuisine a régulièrement été utilisé pour protester, bruyamment, contre le pouvoir en place.
translatedTitle: The concert of saucepans, a noisy and historic protest tool
translatedDesc: From the July Monarchy to the challenge of the pension reform through the demonstrations of the OAS, the kitchen utensil has regularly been used to protest, loudly, against the power in place.

title: Huées et « on est là » à Sélestat : Emmanuel Macron conspué lors d’un bain de foule en Alsace
description: Le président français était en déplacement en Alsace, pour une visite d’usine.
translatedTitle: Boos and "we're here" in Sélestat: Emmanuel Macron shouted down during a walkabout in Alsace
translatedDesc: The French president was traveling in Alsace, for a factory visit.

title: « Avec l’usage de la formule des “cent jours” attachée à l’épopée napoléonienne, c’est comme si Macron voulait tout recommencer »
description: En dessinant « cent jours d’action au service de la France », le chef de l’Etat espère enjamber la crise des retraites, mais aussi redonner du souffle à un second mandat qui n’en a jamais eu, comme le raconte le journaliste Ludovic Vigogne dans un livre sur les cent premiers jours ratés du président réélu il y a un an.
translatedTitle: "With the use of the formula of the "hundred days" attached to the Napoleonic epic, it is as if Macron wanted to start all over again"
translatedDesc: By drawing "a hundred days of action in the service of France", the Head of State hopes to overcome the pension crisis, but also to breathe new life into a second term that never had one, as the journalist tells us. Ludovic Vigogne in a book on the first hundred failed days of the president re-elected a year ago.

title: Laurent Berger quitte la tête de la CFDT : Olivier Véran salue « un partenaire sérieux, exigeant, parfois coriace »
description: Pour Emmanuel Macron, le futur ex-patron de la CFDT est « quelqu’un pour qui j’ai du respect, oserais-je dire de l’amitié ». Sophie Binet (CGT) salue, elle, la « féminisation des organisations syndicales » avec l’arrivée de Marylise Léon à la tête de la CFDT.
translatedTitle: Laurent Berger leaves the head of the CFDT: Olivier Véran hails "a serious, demanding, sometimes tough partner"
translatedDesc: For Emmanuel Macron, the future ex-boss of the CFDT is "someone for whom I have respect, dare I say friendship". Sophie Binet (CGT) welcomes the "feminization of trade union organizations" with the arrival of Marylise Léon at the head of the CFDT.

title: Après l’explosion et l’effondrement de deux bâtiments rue de Tivoli, le « traumatisme » des habitants du quartier du Camas
description: Dix jours après le drame qui a tué huit habitants dans ce quartier du centre de Marseille, 300 personnes n’ont toujours pas regagné leur domicile.
translatedTitle: After the explosion and collapse of two buildings on rue de Tivoli, the "trauma" of the inhabitants of the Camas district
translatedDesc: Ten days after the tragedy that killed eight residents in this district of central Marseille, 300 people have still not returned to their homes.

title: Retraites : « Notre Constitution étant ce qu’elle est, il était paradoxal de fonder tant d’espoirs sur le Conseil constitutionnel »
description: La Constitution, même rééquilibrée au profit du Parlement en 2008, n’a que faiblement restreint la possibilité de cumuls des procédures du parlementarisme rationalisé, affirme, dans une tribune au « Monde », la professeure de droit Valérie Goesel-Le Bihan.
translatedTitle: Pensions: "Our Constitution being what it is, it was paradoxical to pin so many hopes on the Constitutional Council"
translatedDesc: The Constitution, even rebalanced in favor of Parliament in 2008, has only slightly restricted the possibility of cumulating the procedures of rationalized parliamentarism, affirms, in a tribune to the "World", the professor of law Valérie Goesel-Le Bihan.

title: Associations : l’ambivalence de leur financement sous l’œil des sociologues
description: Alors que le financement public de la Ligue des droits de l’homme est au cœur de l’actualité, Anne Bory, dans sa Carte blanche au « Monde », revient sur les travaux des sciences sociales sur l’équilibre fragile entre autonomie des associations et tentation de contrôle par la puissance publique.
translatedTitle: Associations: the ambivalence of their financing under the eye of sociologists
translatedDesc: While the public funding of the League of Human Rights is at the heart of the news, Anne Bory, in her Carte blanche to the "World", returns to the work of the social sciences on the fragile balance between the autonomy of associations and the temptation of control by the public authorities.

title: « Les interdictions des conférences d’Amnesty International sur Israël s’apparentent à des atteintes répétées à la liberté d’expression »
description: Le président d’Amnesty International France, Jean-Claude Samouiller, regrette, dans une tribune au « Monde », le manque de soutien du ministère de l’intérieur alors que l’ONG est confrontée à un déchaînement de haine et de menaces parce qu’elle a qualifié d’« apartheid » le système de répression de l’Etat israélien à l’égard des Palestiniens.
translatedTitle: 'Ban on Amnesty International conferences on Israel amount to repeated attacks on freedom of expression'
translatedDesc: The president of Amnesty International France, Jean-Claude Samouiller, regrets, in a forum in the "World", the lack of support from the Ministry of the Interior while the NGO is faced with an outburst of hatred and threats because she called "apartheid" the Israeli state's system of repression against the Palestinians.

title: Laurent Berger quitte ses fonctions : « Je ne suis pas indispensable à la CFDT »
description: Figure de la lutte contre la réforme des retraites, le secrétaire général du premier syndicat de France a annoncé, mercredi, qu’il laissera sa place le 21 juin à Marylise Léon, actuelle numéro deux de la confédération.
translatedTitle: Laurent Berger leaves office: "I am not essential to the CFDT"
translatedDesc: A figure in the fight against pension reform, the secretary general of the first union in France announced on Wednesday that he will leave his place on June 21 to Marylise Léon, current number two in the confederation.

title: Le retour à tâtons de la loi sur l’immigration
description: Au sortir de la crise liée à la réforme des retraites, le gouvernement tergiverse sur les contours de ce projet de loi. Le ministre de l’intérieur, Gérald Darmanin, a dit mardi vouloir en reprendre l’examen alors qu’Emmanuel Macron avait assuré en mars qu’il serait découpé en plusieurs textes.
translatedTitle: The groping return of immigration law
translatedDesc: At the end of the crisis linked to the pension reform, the government is dithering on the contours of this bill. The Minister of the Interior, Gérald Darmanin, said on Tuesday that he wanted to resume the examination of it while Emmanuel Macron had assured in March that it would be cut into several texts.

title: Contre la fraude fiscale et sociale, le gouvernement promet de durcir la lutte
description: Lutter contre les différentes formes de fraude répond à un double objectif : faire entrer de l’argent dans les caisses de l’Etat, mais aussi adresser un message de fermeté aux classes moyennes.
translatedTitle: Against tax and social fraud, the government promises to toughen the fight
translatedDesc: Fighting against the different forms of fraud meets a double objective: to bring money into the coffers of the State, but also to send a message of firmness to the middle classes.

title: Emmanuel Macron rattrapé en Alsace par les huées et la colère persistante contre la réforme des retraites
description: La journée du chef de l’Etat, venu visiter une usine, a été marquée par des bains de foules dans une ambiance parfois très hostile. Dans un entretien accordé aux journaux régionaux du groupe Ebra, le chef de l’Etat assure « mesurer les colères ».
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron caught up in Alsace by boos and persistent anger against pension reform
translatedDesc: The day of the Head of State, who came to visit a factory, was marked by crowds in a sometimes very hostile atmosphere. In an interview with the regional newspapers of the Ebra group, the head of state claims to "measure the anger".

title: Réforme des retraites : « Sur le plan du contrôle a priori des lois, le Conseil constitutionnel n’existerait pas qu’on ne s’en rendrait pas vraiment compte »
description: Constatant le rôle restreint joué par le Conseil constitutionnel en comparaison de ce qu’il est dans les démocraties voisines, le juriste Dominique Chagnollaud ouvre, dans une tribune au « Monde », plusieurs pistes pour contrôler plus efficacement la constitutionnalité des lois, quitte à réformer l’institution.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: "In terms of a priori control of laws, the Constitutional Council would not exist that we would not really realize it"
translatedDesc: Noting the limited role played by the Constitutional Council compared to what it is in neighboring democracies, the jurist Dominique Chagnollaud opens, in a forum in the "World", several avenues to more effectively control the constitutionality of laws, even if it means reforming the institution.

title: Les contours de France Travail, futur service public de l’emploi se précisent
description: Le rapport de la mission de préfiguration de France Travail devait être présenté par le ministre du travail, Olivier Dussopt, mercredi. Entre 2,3 et 2,7 milliards d’euros doivent être investis entre 2024 et 2026.
translatedTitle: The contours of France Travail, the future public employment service, are becoming clearer
translatedDesc: The report of the prefiguration mission of France Travail was to be presented by the Minister of Labor, Olivier Dussopt, on Wednesday. Between 2.3 and 2.7 billion euros must be invested between 2024 and 2026.

title: Didier Maus : « La leçon de droit parlementaire appliqué du Conseil constitutionnel sur la réforme des retraites devrait servir de modèle »
description: Critiquée après sa décision de valider l’essentiel de la proposition de loi sur les retraites, l’institution a pourtant rendu un jugement en cohérence avec sa ligne habituelle, estime l’ancien conseiller d’Etat, dans une tribune au « Monde ».
translatedTitle: Didier Maus: "The Constitutional Council's applied parliamentary law lesson on pension reform should serve as a model"
translatedDesc: Criticized after its decision to validate the main part of the pension bill, the institution nevertheless rendered a judgment consistent with its usual line, believes the former State Councilor, in a forum in the "World".

title: Les JO 2024 à Paris, un horizon lointain dans les quartiers populaires
description: A moins de 500 jours de l’ouverture des Jeux olympiques et paralympiques de Paris, les banlieues du Nord et de l’Est ne sont pas encore pleinement entrées dans l’aventure et espèrent que les prochaines échéances permettront de renverser la vapeur.
translatedTitle: The 2024 Olympics in Paris, a distant horizon in working-class neighborhoods
translatedDesc: Less than 500 days from the opening of the Olympic and Paralympic Games in Paris, the northern and eastern suburbs have not yet fully entered into the adventure and hope that the next events will turn the tide.

title: Plus des deux tiers des actifs de plus de 40 ans craignent de ne pas tenir jusqu’à la retraite
description: Selon l’étude Fondation The Adecco Group - Crédoc, publiée mercredi 19 avril, les enjeux de la seconde partie de carrière qui s’imposent aux RH en 2023 sont la santé, la rémunération et l’anticipation de l’évolution professionnelle.
translatedTitle: More than two-thirds of working people over 40 fear they won't last until retirement
translatedDesc: According to The Adecco Group - Crédoc Foundation study, published on Wednesday April 19, the challenges of the second part of a career that are imposed on HR in 2023 are health, compensation and anticipation of professional development.

title: Les semi-vérités du récit de la secrétaire d’Etat Sonia Backès sur la Scientologie
description: Chargée des dérives sectaires, l’élue néo-calédonienne est accusée par son demi-frère d’exagérer à des fins politiques sa rupture avec sa mère morte à l’été 2022 et qui appartenait à l’Eglise de scientologie.
translatedTitle: The half-truths of Secretary of State Sonia Backès' account of Scientology
translatedDesc: Charged with sectarian aberrations, the elected New Caledonian is accused by her half-brother of exaggerating for political purposes her break with her mother who died in the summer of 2022 and who belonged to the Church of Scientology.

title: Entre Eric Dupond-Moretti et la police, l’éclaircie après l’orage
description: Le garde des sceaux insiste désormais sur une vision régalienne partagée entre les forces de l’ordre et la justice. Un front uni qui prend une importance particulière alors qu’Emmanuel Macron a fait de « l’ordre républicain » l’un de ses chantiers prioritaires.
translatedTitle: Between Eric Dupond-Moretti and the police, the thinning after the storm
translatedDesc: The Keeper of the Seals now insists on a sovereign vision shared between the police and justice. A united front which takes on particular importance as Emmanuel Macron has made "the republican order" one of his priority projects.

title: Réforme des retraites : « La recevabilité de la nouvelle version du RIP pourrait se heurter à trois obstacles »
description: Si la nouvelle mouture du référendum d’initiative partagée sur les retraites − sur laquelle le Conseil constitutionnel doit rendre sa décision le 3 mai − évite plusieurs écueils, d’autres motifs d’irrecevabilité pourraient être mis en avant, estime Jérôme Roux, professeur de droit public, dans une tribune au « Monde ».
translatedTitle: Pension reform: "The admissibility of the new version of the RIP could come up against three obstacles"
translatedDesc: If the new version of the referendum of shared initiative on pensions – on which the Constitutional Council must render its decision on May 3 – avoids several pitfalls, other grounds for inadmissibility could be put forward, estimates Jérôme Roux, professor of public law, in a forum in the "World".

title: Face au « gouvernement des juges », les ambiguïtés du Rassemblement national
description: Peu diserte après la décision du Conseil constitutionnel sur la réforme des retraites, Marine Le Pen tranche avec l’ADN de son mouvement, historiquement adversaire de l’« Etat de droit ». Dans le reste de l’extrême droite, cette critique reste vivace.
translatedTitle: Faced with the "government of judges", the ambiguities of the National Rally
translatedDesc: Little eloquent after the decision of the Constitutional Council on the pension reform, Marine Le Pen contrasts with the DNA of her movement, historically adversary of the "Rule of law". In the rest of the far right, this criticism remains strong.

title: Emmanuel Macron filmé en train de chanter avec un groupe de jeunes soupçonné de liens avec l’extrême droite
description: « Il ne pouvait connaître à ce moment-là les antécédents de chaque personne avec laquelle il discutait », selon l’entourage du chef de l’Etat.
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron filmed singing with a group of young people suspected of links with the far right
translatedDesc: "He could not know at that time the background of each person he was talking to," according to the head of state's entourage.

title: Réforme des retraites : revivez la journée de mardi, au lendemain de l’allocution d’Emmanuel Macron
description: Le président devait assister à un concert à la maison d’éducation de la Légion d’honneur, au lendemain de son allocution sur la réforme des retraites.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: relive the day on Tuesday, the day after Emmanuel Macron's speech
translatedDesc: The president was to attend a concert at the education house of the Legion of Honor, the day after his speech on the pension reform.

title: Dans les « trois chantiers prioritaires » d’Emmanuel Macron, beaucoup de mesures déjà annoncées ou engagées
description: Le chef de l’Etat a lancé, lundi, une période de cent jours pour relancer son quinquennat en évoquant des dispositifs pour la plupart connus et qui font l’objet de contestations.
translatedTitle: In Emmanuel Macron's "three priority projects", many measures already announced or initiated
translatedDesc: The Head of State launched, on Monday, a period of one hundred days to relaunch his five-year term by evoking devices for the most known and which are the subject of disputes.

title: Les propos de Bruno Le Maire sur les aides sociales envoyées « au Maghreb » suscitent la colère de la gauche
description: « Nos compatriotes en ont ras le bol de la fraude [sociale] », a jugé mardi sur BFM-TV le ministre des finances. « L’extrême droite remplit dangereusement le vide gouvernemental », a réagi le premier secrétaire du PS, Olivier Faure.
translatedTitle: Bruno Le Maire's comments on social aid sent "to the Maghreb" anger the left
translatedDesc: "Our compatriots are fed up with [social] fraud", the Minister of Finance judged on BFM-TV on Tuesday. "The far right is dangerously filling the government void," responded PS first secretary Olivier Faure.

title: Réforme des retraites : « Ce n’est pas la justice constitutionnelle qui est en cause, mais bien les conditions dans lesquelles elle est rendue en France »
description: Dans une tribune au « Monde », la professeure de droit public Lauréline Fontaine explique que les décisions du 14 avril font oublier qu’une Constitution est établie pour fixer des limites au pouvoir afin qu’il ne s’exerce pas de manière arbitraire.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: "It is not constitutional justice that is in question, but the conditions under which it is rendered in France"
translatedDesc: In a column in the "World", public law professor Lauréline Fontaine explains that the decisions of April 14 make us forget that a Constitution is established to set limits on power so that it is not exercised arbitrarily.

title: L’Assemblée nationale est à nouveau au complet : retrouvez les 577 députés
description: EN UN GRAPHIQUE - Depuis plus de quatre mois, sept sièges de députés étaient vacants, dans l’attente des résultats de plusieurs élections partielles.
translatedTitle: The National Assembly is once again complete: find the 577 deputies
translatedDesc: IN A GRAPH – For more than four months, seven seats of deputies had been vacant, pending the results of several by-elections.

title: Pour Emmanuel Macron, les pesanteurs d’un quinquennat sans horizon
description: Dans son allocution télévisée, lundi, le chef de l’Etat s’est donné un trimestre pour tenter de sortir du blocage né du conflit sur la réforme des retraites. Il dispose de très peu de marge pour y parvenir.
translatedTitle: For Emmanuel Macron, the heaviness of a five-year term without horizon
translatedDesc: In his televised address on Monday, the head of state gave himself a quarter to try to break the deadlock arising from the conflict over pension reform. He has very little margin to achieve this.

title: Emmanuel Macron annonce un « pacte de la vie au travail », les syndicats de salariés toujours opposés à la réforme des retraites
description: Alors que le chef de l’Etat cherche à jouer l’« apaisement », les organisations de salariés ont la ferme intention de continuer la mobilisation contre l’entrée en vigueur du texte.
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron announces a "work life pact", employee unions still opposed to pension reform
translatedDesc: While the Head of State seeks to play "appeasement", the employee organizations have the firm intention of continuing the mobilization against the entry into force of the text.

title: Dans l’affaire du Fonds Marianne, embarras au sein de l’Etat après la mise en cause de Marlène Schiappa
description: Face au scandale suscité par l’octroi de dotations publiques dans le cadre du projet créé après l’assassinat de Samuel Paty, la secrétaire d’Etat balaie les accusations. La maire de Paris, Anne Hidalgo, a déposé plainte.
translatedTitle: In the case of the Marianne Fund, embarrassment within the State after the questioning of Marlène Schiappa
translatedDesc: Faced with the scandal caused by the granting of public grants within the framework of the project created after the assassination of Samuel Paty, the Secretary of State sweeps away the accusations. The mayor of Paris, Anne Hidalgo, filed a complaint.

title: Quatre-vingts ans après l’insurrection du ghetto de Varsovie, les survivants du Bund se souviennent
description: L’organisation juive et socialiste qui résista aux nazis joua un rôle moteur dans l’insurrection du ghetto de Varsovie, en 1943, contre les SS. De rares témoins se souviennent de la place qu’il occupait dans la vie des communautés d’Europe de l’Est.
translatedTitle: Eighty years after the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising, Bund survivors remember
translatedDesc: The Jewish and socialist organization that resisted the Nazis played a leading role in the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising in 1943 against the SS. Rare witnesses remember the place he occupied in the life of the communities of Eastern Europe.

title: Bernard Cazeneuve veut rassembler la gauche ni Macron ni Mélenchon
description: L’ancien premier ministre de François Hollande se prépare pour l’élection présidentielle de 2027. Son objectif : fédérer les élus et les électeurs de gauche déçus par le chef de l’Etat et opposés à l’alliance avec la Nupes du leader LFI.
translatedTitle: Bernard Cazeneuve wants to bring together the left neither Macron nor Mélenchon
translatedDesc: The former Prime Minister of François Hollande is preparing for the presidential election of 2027. His objective: to unite elected officials and left-wing voters disappointed by the Head of State and opposed to the alliance with the Nupes of the leader LFI.

title: Réforme des retraites : « La bienveillance du Conseil constitutionnel est le retour du refoulé autoritaire issu des origines de la Vᵉ République »
description: La lecture strictement juridique de la réforme des retraites par le Conseil constitutionnel est le reflet de son histoire, estime Alexandre Viala, professeur de droit public, dans une tribune au « Monde » : celle d’un outil créé en vue de rationaliser le Parlement et de restreindre son influence.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: "The benevolence of the Constitutional Council is the return of the repressed authoritarian from the origins of the Fifth Republic"
translatedDesc: The strictly legal reading of the pension reform by the Constitutional Council is a reflection of its history, believes Alexandre Viala, professor of public law, in a forum in the "World": that of a tool created with a view to rationalizing Parliament and to limit its influence.

title: Emmanuel Macron, dans l’impasse politique, se donne cent jours pour relancer un quinquennat ensablé
description: Travail, sécurité, santé… Lors d’une allocution, le chef de l’Etat a présenté plusieurs chantiers pour tenter de faire oublier l’impopulaire réforme des retraites.
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron, in political stalemate, gives himself a hundred days to relaunch a silted five-year term
translatedDesc: Work, safety, health… During a speech, the Head of State presented several projects to try to make people forget the unpopular pension reform.

title: Emmanuel Macron promet une école qui change, et liste des sujets qui fâchent les enseignants
description: En égrenant, en quelques secondes, les chantiers en cours au sein de l’éducation nationale, le chef de l’Etat a donné l’image d’une école en pleine transformation. Mais les changements font l’objet de crispations dans la communauté éducative.
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron promises a school that changes, and list of subjects that annoy teachers
translatedDesc: By listing, in a few seconds, the projects in progress within the national education system, the Head of State gave the image of a school in full transformation. But the changes are the subject of tensions in the educational community.

title: « Désengorger » les urgences d’ici à fin 2024 : les médecins « attendent de voir » comment sera déclinée la promesse
description: L’objectif avancé par Emmanuel Macron, lundi, a suscité de premières réactions contrastées, alors que ces services hospitaliers traversent une crise depuis plusieurs années.
translatedTitle: "Decongest" emergency rooms by the end of 2024: doctors are "waiting to see" how the promise will be declined
translatedDesc: The objective put forward by Emmanuel Macron on Monday aroused first contrasting reactions, while these hospital services have been going through a crisis for several years.

title: Allocution d’Emmanuel Macron : ce qu’il faut en retenir
description: Le chef de l’Etat a dit regretter qu’un « consensus n’a[it] pas pu être trouvé » sur la réforme des retraites, mais est resté campé sur ses positions.
translatedTitle: Speech by Emmanuel Macron: what to remember
translatedDesc: The head of state said he regretted that a "consensus could not be found" on the pension reform, but remained entrenched in his positions.

title: Réforme des retraites : Emmanuel Macron se donne « cent jours » pour agir « au service de la France »
description: Le chef de l’Etat a fixé, lundi soir lors d’une allocution télévisée, trois chantiers, à commencer par la construction, avec les partenaires sociaux, d’un « nouveau pacte de la vie au travail » dont les contours restent à définir.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: Emmanuel Macron gives himself "one hundred days" to act "in the service of France"
translatedDesc: The Head of State set, Monday evening during a televised address, three projects, starting with the construction, with the social partners, of a "new pact for life at work", the outlines of which remain to be defined. .

title: Réforme des retraites : revivez l’allocution d’Emmanuel Macron, trois jours après la promulgation de la loi
description: Des opposants à la réforme des retraites se sont rassemblés dans plusieurs villes de France pendant l’allocution d’Emmanuel Macron, lundi soir. A la nuit tombée, des manifestations spontanées ont donné lieu à des incidents, notamment à Lyon.
translatedTitle: Pension reform: relive Emmanuel Macron's speech, three days after the enactment of the law
translatedDesc: Opponents of the pension reform gathered in several cities in France during Emmanuel Macron's speech on Monday evening. At nightfall, spontaneous demonstrations gave rise to incidents, particularly in Lyon.

title: L’allocution d’Emmanuel Macron accueillie par des concerts de casseroles et les critiques des syndicats
description: L’intersyndicale a estimé lundi soir que le président de la République « n’a toujours pas compris la colère qui s’exprime dans le pays ». Elle appelle de nouveau à faire du « 1er mai une journée de mobilisation massive, unitaire et populaire ».
translatedTitle: Emmanuel Macron's speech greeted by concerts of saucepans and criticism from the unions
translatedDesc: The inter-union estimated Monday evening that the President of the Republic "has still not understood the anger that is expressed in the country". She calls again to make "May 1 a day of massive, unitary and popular mobilization".

title: Manifestation contre la réforme des retraites : un militant CGT condamné à trois mois de prison avec sursis à Strasbourg
